Uses of Package
org.greatage.ioc.scope

Packages that use org.greatage.ioc.scope
org.greatage.ioc This package represents all base Great Age IoC container classes. 
org.greatage.ioc.scope This package represents all classes for working with service scopes. 
org.greatage.tapestry.internal   
 

Classes in org.greatage.ioc.scope used by org.greatage.ioc
Scope
          This interface represents service scope object that is used to obtain service instances according to their scope.
 

Classes in org.greatage.ioc.scope used by org.greatage.ioc.scope
AbstractScope
          This class represents abstract Scope implementation that look ups service instance inside the scope and if it is not found creates new instance using specified service builder.
Scope
          This interface represents service scope object that is used to obtain service instances according to their scope.
ScopeManager
          This interface represents utility service that obtains scope instances by their name.
 

Classes in org.greatage.ioc.scope used by org.greatage.tapestry.internal
ScopeManager
          This interface represents utility service that obtains scope instances by their name.
